pros: Comfortable engineered mesh; Exceptional durability; Excellent value for price; Gusseted tongue; Ideal for heel strikers; Plush foam cushioning; Perfect for beginners; Full-length Air unit
cons: Small price increase from v10; Notable weight gain; Lacks stability; Low-volume toebox
RR_verdict: In our view, the Nike Winflo 11 remains a fantastic value-oriented running shoe. We were delighted to discover that it's now more spacious and cushioned, and now it boasts an upgraded engineered mesh upper that enhances breathability and durability. On the downside, it's heavier and less stable than its predecessor, but this doesn't stop us from recommending it. For any neutral runner with budget considerations, the Winflo 11 is a really solid choice.
awards: Top pick in best cheap running shoes, Top pick in best cheap Nike running shoes, Top 30% in running shoes for beginners, Top 19% most popular running shoes
use: Jogging |, Treadmill |, Walking |, All-day wear |, For beginners
